## EventGenerator.fire() method

Fire the named event

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fire<T>(event: string, value?: T, originalEvent?: Event): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | string | Event to fire |
|  value | T | Value to pass to event handlers |
|  originalEvent | Event | Optional original event that caused this event to be fired. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
